title: 11-20-17 Afton Warrick, Roseann Kermes, and Leslie Rutland Chat with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Afton Warrick writes at Quilting Mod and I love the projects she shares. Being a HUGE Alice in Wonderland fan, I right away started to follow her progress on her amazing Alice in Wonderland quilt, I knew we needed to be friends! Today we are going to chat a bit of Alice love, but also about documenting your quilting, and I am hoping she has a few tips on sewing with a new baby for you moms out there.
===========
I love chatting with Roseann Kermes of Rosebud's cottage. She is so talented and has fantastic ideas. We talk a lot of holiday ideas & a bit of UFO busting. And did you know she has a fantastic book?
===========
Leslie Rutland is the voice of the Seasoned Homemaker website. I’ve been wanted to chat with her for a long time and today is the day! She has a lot of sewing, diy, quilting and more.. it’s inspiring to visit her!
================
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
